00024 #ifndef DAZ_MEMORY_MONITOR_DEFS_H
00025 #define DAZ_MEMORY_MONITOR_DEFS_H
00026 
00027 /*****************************
00028     Includes
00029 *****************************/
00030 
00031 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) && defined(_DEBUG) && !defined(TOOL_INCLUDE)
00032 //these need to be included before define because new,free,etc are redefined.
00033 #include <QtCore/QString>
00034 #include <QtCore/QByteArray>
00035 #include <QtCore/QList>
00036 #include <QtCore/QVector>
00037 #include <QtCore/QMap>
00038 #include <QtCore/QRegExp>
00039 #include <QtCore/QHash>
00040 #include <QtCore/QMutex>
00041 
00042 #define _CRTDBG_MAP_ALLOC
00043 #include <stdlib.h>
00044 #include <crtdbg.h>
00045 
00046 #if defined( Q_OS_WIN )
00047 #  ifdef DZ_MAKEDLL // Create a DLL library
00048 #    define DZ_MEM_EXPORT  __declspec(dllexport)
00049 #  else // Use a DLL library
00050 #    define DZ_MEM_EXPORT  __declspec(dllimport)
00051 #  endif
00052 #elif defined( Q_OS_MAC )
00053 #  ifdef DZ_MAKEDLL // Create a DLL library
00054 #    define DZ_MEM_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00055 #  else // Use a DLL library
00056 #    define DZ_MEM_EXPORT
00057 #  endif
00058 #else
00059 #  define DZ_MEM_EXPORT
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 DZ_MEM_EXPORT void* __cdecl dz_memNew(size_t _Size, int normBlock, const char *file, int lineNum, bool shouldTrack,bool keepStack);
00063 DZ_MEM_EXPORT void* __cdecl dz_memNewArray(size_t _Size, int normBlock, const char *file, int lineNum, bool shouldTrack,bool keepStack);
00064 DZ_MEM_EXPORT void __cdecl dz_memDel(void *p);
00065 DZ_MEM_EXPORT void __cdecl dz_memDelArray(void *p);
00066 
00067 inline void* __cdecl operator new(size_t _Size)
00068 { return dz_memNew(_Size,_NORMAL_BLOCK,__FILE__,__LINE__,false,false); }
00069 
00070 inline void* __cdecl operator new[](size_t _Size)
00071 { return dz_memNewArray(_Size,_NORMAL_BLOCK,__FILE__ ,__LINE__ ,false,false); }
00072 
00073 inline void * __cdecl operator new(size_t _Size,int block,const char *file,int line,bool shouldTrack,bool keepStack)
00074 { return dz_memNew(_Size,block,file,line,shouldTrack,keepStack); }
00075 
00076 inline void * __cdecl operator new[](size_t _Size,int block,const char *file,int line,bool shouldTrack,bool keepStack)
00077 { return dz_memNewArray(_Size,block,file,line,shouldTrack,keepStack); }
00078 
00079 inline void __cdecl operator delete(void *_P)
00080 { dz_memDel(_P); }
00081 
00082 inline void __cdecl operator delete[](void *_P)
00083 { dz_memDelArray(_P); }
00084 
00085 inline void __cdecl operator delete(void * _P, int, const char *, int,bool shouldTrack,bool keepStack)
00086 { ::operator delete(_P); }
00087 
00088 inline void __cdecl operator delete[](void * _P, int, const char *, int,bool shouldTrack,bool keepStack)
00089 { ::operator delete[](_P); }
00090 
00091 extern void dzCleanUpStaticDeleteList();

00093 #define DEBUG_NEW new(_NORMAL_BLOCK, __FILE__, __LINE__, true, false)
00094 #define new DEBUG_NEW
00095 
00096 #define DEBUG_STACK_NEW new(_NORMAL_BLOCK, __FILE__, __LINE__, true, true)
